items.sentence: Sooner or later, the hostages will be set free.
Tom was the only person Mary wanted to talk to.
Strange to say, none of us noticed the mistake.
If anybody did that to me, I'd call the police.
I think that Tom did that to make Mary jealous.
I didn't invite anyone other than Tom and Mary.
You can stop looking for it now. I've found it.
Tom said that he didn't want to deal with that.
Swimming across this river will be challenging.
All the passengers were able to swim to safety.
